import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { call, location, mail, globe, chevronBack, ellipsisVerticalOutline} from 'ionicons/icons' import { IonContent, IonHeader, IonPage, IonTitle, IonToolbar, IonCard, IonItem, IonCardContent, IonIcon, IonButtons, IonBackButton, IonButton, IonPopover } from '@ionic/react'; import {Contact, ContactField, ContactName } from '@ionic-native/contacts'; import './Contact.css'; const ContactPg: React.FC = () => { const addContact = async () =>{ var contact = new Contact(); contact.name = new ContactName('Frank', 'Allart'); contact.phoneNumber = new ContactField('mobile','0000'); contact.save(); }; const [showPopover, setShowPopover] = useState(false); return ( Contact setShowPopover(true)}> setShowPopover(false)}> Notifications

 ); }; export default ContactPg;
